metadata.title: CVE-2024-46803 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdkfd: Check debug trap enable before write dbg_ev_fileIn interrupt context, write dbg_ev_file will be run by work queue. Itwill cause write dbg_ev_file execution after debug_trap_disable, whichwill cause NULL pointer access.v2: cancel work "debug_event_workarea" before set dbg_ev_file as NULL.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
